values: To satisfy someone means to make that person happy.
It will satisfy my teacher if I finish all my homework.
v.满足
vt. & vi. 使满意；满足
vt. 使确信符合，达到(要求、规定、标准等)
时态:satisfied，satisfying，satisfies
